name: West Midlands Daytripper (smaller West Midlands area)
description: n-NETWORK DAYTRIPPER Unlimited travel with weekday time restrictions for one day on all trains, buses and Metro trams throughout the Network West Midlands area zones one to five. A separate adult ticket is available called the ADULT PLUS which is valid to the following stations: Stratford-upon-Avon, Kenilworth, Kidderminster, Leamington Spa, Lichfield and Warwick after 09:30 and costs £10.70. NOT VALID between Coventry and Leamington Spa on Cross Country Trains. A separate adult ticket is available called the ADULT ADD-ON which is valid to the following stations: Landywood, Cannock, Hednesford, Rugeley Town and Rugeley Trent Valley after 09:30 and costs £9.30. A separate adult ticket is available for peak time travel called the 1 day nnetwork Zones 1-5 valid anytime and costs £10.00 The Adult Plus and Adult Add-on tickets can only be purchased from railway stations and should be purchased with the Daytripper ticket. Note that the "Network West Midlands" area is NOT the same as the West Midlands Day Ranger area

fares_1_day.family: £15.00 (up to 6 people, not more than two of whom may be 16 or over and each group must contain at least one adult and one child (5-15))

time_restrictions: Mon to Fri: valid from 09:30 but "peak" ticket valid anytime. No restrictions at weekends or bank holidays.
route_restrictions: Not valid on CrossCountry between Coventry and Leamington Spa.
where_to_buy: Valid ticket to travel is required unless boarded at a station without ticket-issuing facilities
